Action.author: denyeart
Action.body: ~jyellick Is there not yet a way to control who can create channels? Care to add to ipm backlog?

Action.author: jyellick
Action.body: We can add this to the backlog. You may control who can create channels if you edit your genesis block or update the channel config using {{configtxlator}}, but there's no support for doing it via {{configtx.yaml}}. We can add it to the backlog, but unless we decide it's a priority, I don't see this making v2.0.
